about.title: About
about.pageDescription: A software engineer who loves creating, dedicated to solving problems with technology
about.intro1: Friends often call me a "tech warm guy". Beyond the rational logic of code, I value the warmth between people. I firmly believe that good software should not only be technically excellent but also considerate of user needs.
about.intro2: As a freelance engineer, I have
about.intro2Part2: , capable of solving complex system problems; I also have
about.intro2Part3: , able to discuss every detail of your project in plain language. I'm not just an executor, but a trustworthy partner.
about.intro3: My personality is gentle and patient, and I enjoy listening to your ideas. Whether it's brainstorming in the early stages of a project or back-and-forth discussions during development, I will work with you with the most sincere attitude to polish out the most perfect work.
about.skillsDescription: My tech stack can handle various development needs
about.processDescription: Transparent and efficient project execution process

process.communicationDesc: Deep understanding of your needs, goals, and expectations to ensure the project direction is correct.
process.planningDesc: Develop detailed project plans and design solutions that meet requirements.
process.developmentDesc: Develop using best practices, reporting project progress regularly.
process.launchDesc: Rigorous testing to ensure quality, assist with deployment and provide ongoing support.

services.pricingDescription: Flexible cooperation methods to meet different project scale requirements

pricing.basicDesc: Suitable for small businesses or personal brands
pricing.proDesc: Suitable for medium enterprises and growing brands
pricing.enterpriseDesc: Suitable for large enterprises and complex needs

faqs.q1: How long does project development take?
faqs.a1: Development time depends on project complexity. A typical corporate website takes about 4-6 weeks, while more complex e-commerce or custom systems may take 2-4 months. I will provide a detailed schedule before the project starts.
faqs.a2: We typically use installment payments: 30% deposit upon signing, 40% at mid-development, and 30% upon project completion. Payment terms can be flexibly adjusted based on project needs.
faqs.q3: Do you provide maintenance after completion?
faqs.a3: Yes, all projects include a free maintenance period. After the maintenance period ends, you can choose to renew maintenance services to ensure your website remains stable and receives technical support.
faqs.q4: Can I see the design before deciding?
faqs.a4: Before formal development, I will provide website architecture planning and design drafts for your confirmation. Development only begins after the design direction meets your expectations, giving you peace of mind.

contact.title: Contact
contact.pageDescription: Have any questions or project requirements? Feel free to contact me, let's create something great together
contact.infoDescription: I'm happy to hear your thoughts and needs. My communication style is gentle and rational, and I will patiently discuss every detail with you. Feel free to add me on Line, let's chat about your project like friends.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will reply soon.
